text: Ingaba wona amaMuslim axhomekeke kubungqina obucacileyo (i’Kur`ân) obuvela eNkosini yawo, (bungqina) obo ingqina (uJibrîl) elabucengceleza buvela kuYe (uAllâh), kanti nangaphambili kunabo, kwakufike iNcwadi kaMûsâ, isisiKhokelo nenceba, ayakholwa kuyo (amaMuslim)? Kodwa abo beemvaba ngeemvaba, bangayamkeliyo (i’Kur’ân), uMlilo uya kuba yindawo yabo yokuhlangana yedinga, musa ukuthandabuza ke wena ngayo. Inene yona yinyaniso evela eNkosini yakho, kodwa uninzi lwabantu alukholwa
